attributes.action: End the Spin and tell the truth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gorden Brown is making big statements about the need of oil companies to lower fuel prices now oil is down to levels experianced early two years ago

However what he is not saying is that the £ is worth appx 20% less and therefore Petrol should be up 20% on the oil company content of the price of two years ago because of exchange rates

He is playing a spin game and not telling the truth by treating us and the oil companies like those who have no knowledge or sense

My appeal is for less political double talk and more honesty

Keith Sherwood
